about.title: About Us
about.mission: Starting as a Spin-off from Involcan, our mission is to lead the transition of the logistics-port sector towards climate neutrality, aligning with international regulations such as the European Green Deal and the IMO Net Zero 2050 strategy.
about.transform: We transform ports and vessels into sustainable infrastructures through the implementation of efficient and economically viable solutions for carbon capture.
about.longTerm: In the long term, our goal is to perfect the generation of synthetic fuels from the syngas produced, which will allow us to compete directly with hydrocarbon companies and offer carbon-neutral solutions.
about.tagline: From the Canary Islands to the world, bringing climate innovation to a global scale.
